name: Spaceman's Sweatshirt
description:
This Sweatshirt is made of cozy soft cotton French terry. The body is a space-dyed purple and grey terry. The top portion of the sleeve is the inside of the terry, while the body and bottom sleeve is the outside. The cuffs and neck line are bound with a super soft cotton 2 by 2 rib knit in a rich navy. 

CHOOSE CORRECT SIZE. only available in this color in cotton

This garment size runs true to size, and it a bit fitted through the body.  but looks great with the sleeves rolled up if you want to order up a size or two. 

pictured in size 12-18 months

Made in New York City
100% cotton
machine wash cool and dry with low heat to minimize shrinkage. 

For more info visit our 'about us' page.
